Posts.Content: Go to another doctor.  AND CONTINUE to go to other practioners until they find out what is wrong with you.  You may have a fungal infection in your ear and not a bacterial one.  That happened to me and for months on end I suffered until I finally saw a doctor who fixed my ear in one visit!!!  Don't give in to "we can't find out specifically what your problem is".  Good luck in your search for help - it is there - you just have to find it!!!
Posts.Title: strange pains -concerned with reaccurance
